tool_description: Calculate the distance between addresses via API
name: Address Distance Calculator
title: Address Distance Calculator

api_list.name: Get Distance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://address-distance-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/api/get_distance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "address-distance-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://address-distance-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/api/get_distance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "address-distance-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
